workflow.name: Build a complete email CRM with Google Sheets & MailerSend
workflow.description:
## ‚úâÔ∏è Automate MailerSend Email (Google Sheets)

---

### üåê Overview
This workflow converts **Google Sheets into a full Email CRM** ‚Äî no HubSpot or Customer.io needed!  
It automates segmentation, sending, validation, and delivery tracking using:

‚úÖ Google Sheets ‚Üí CDP + Email Performance DB  
‚úÖ MailerSend ‚Üí Email Template Delivery  
‚úÖ n8n ‚Üí Automation + Logic + Scheduling

It automatically:
‚Ä¢ Reads subscribers from a selected segment sheet  
‚Ä¢ Validates email + checks for disposable domains  
‚Ä¢ Sends a MailerSend email template  
‚Ä¢ Updates send status + delivery result in Sheets

Perfect for onboarding emails, promo campaigns, retention flows, newsletters & more!

---

### ‚úÖ Key Features
‚Ä¢ üéØ Unlimited audience segments  
‚Ä¢ üö´ Deduplication system per execution  
‚Ä¢ üõ°Ô∏è Disposable email filtering  
‚Ä¢ üîÑ Automatic recurring runs (every 30 minutes)  
‚Ä¢ üß© Template-based personalization (name, codes, journey)  
‚Ä¢ üìä Real-time delivery tracking + analytics-ready data  
‚Ä¢ üîê Zero CRM vendor lock-in  

---

### üìä Database Sheets (Google Sheets Required)

Use this database template:  
üîó https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17KqltP-NqchPhZV7gk6QToqCZX6IiA5EBkDCBNsIX_0/edit?usp=sharing

| Sheet Name | Purpose | Required Fields |
|-----------|---------|----------------|
| `template` | Campaign configuration | Id, template_name, journey, type, type_template_id, discount_code |
| `segment1` / `segment2` | Audience lists | user_id, email, first_name, number |
| `transaction` | Status + results history | user_id, status, sent_result, sent_at, template_name |

### transaction
| CreatedAt                        | UpdatedAt                        | user_id         | email                   | number      | first_name | status     | database_id | type  | template_id | type_template_id   | template_name   | journey | discount_code | gift_code |
|----------------------------------|----------------------------------|-----------------|------------------------|-------------|------------|------------|-------------|------|-------------|-------------------|-----------------|---------|---------------|-----------|
| 2025-10-25T13:11:41.567-04:00    | 2025-10-25T13:11:41.567-04:00    | uid_0000000001  | nimasalimi42@gmail.com | 9362000000  | Liam       | 1-sending  | segment1    | email | 1           | v28xxl2sq8dg785k  | SMS-TEST        | Test    | disxxx        |           |
| 2025-10-25T13:11:41.567-04:00    | 2025-10-25T13:11:41.567-04:00    | uid_0000000002  | user2@gmail.com        | 9362000001  | Noah       | 1-sending  | segment1    | email | 1           | v28xxl2sq8dg785k  | SMS-TEST        | Test    | disxxx        |           |
| 2025-10-25T13:11:41.567-04:00    | 2025-10-25T13:11:41.567-04:00    | uid_0000000003  | user3@gmail.com        | 9362000002  | Oliver     | 1-sending  | segment1    | email | 1           | v28xxl2sq8dg785k  | SMS-TEST        | Test    | disxxx        |           |

## template
| Id | template_name              | journey        | database_id | type  | type_template_id   | discount_code | gift_code |
|----|---------------------------|----------------|-------------|------|-------------------|---------------|-----------|
| 3  | Order-Confirmation        | Order          | segment3    | email | v28xxl2sq8dg785k  | discount2     |           |
| 4  | Shipping-Notification     | Notification   | segment4    | email | v28xxl2sq8dg785c  | discount3     |           |
| 5  | Add-to-Cart-day1          | Add-to-Car     | segment5    | email | v28xxl2sq8dg785d  | discount4     |           |
| 6  | Welcome-New-Customer      | Welcome        | segment6    | email | v28xxl2sq8dg785s  | discount5     |           |
| 7  | Churn-Pro-Plan            | Churn          | segment7    | email | v28xxl2sq8dg785g  | proxc         |           |
| 8  | Churn-Pro-Plan-1day-ago   | Churn          | segment8    | email | v28xxl2sq8dg785h  |               | shipx     |

## segment1
| user_id         | email                   | number        | first_name | database_id |
|-----------------|-------------------------|--------------|------------|-------------|
| uid_0000000001  | nimasalimi42@gmail.com  | 09362000000  | Liam       | segment1    |
| uid_0000000002  | user2@gmail.com         | 09362000001  | Noah       | segment1    |
| uid_0000000003  | user3@gmail.com         | 09362000002  | Oliver     | segment1    |
| uid_0000000004  | user4@gmail.com         | 09362000003  | Elijah     | segment1    |
| uid_0000000005  | user5@gmail.com         | 09362000004  | James      | segment1    |


üìå Add more segments simply by creating new sheets (segment3, segment4...)  
üìå Change campaign by updating `template_id` in Setup Flow node  

---

### üë§ Who‚Äôs it for?
‚Ä¢ Ecommerce email retention teams  
‚Ä¢ SaaS CRM automation operators  
‚Ä¢ Digital marketing & lifecycle pros  
‚Ä¢ Agencies running multi-brand campaigns  
‚Ä¢ No-code builders who want scalable CRM logic

---

### ‚öôÔ∏è Automations Included

#### Flow 1 ‚Äî Insert Users (Triggered on schedule)
‚Ä¢ Pull users from selected segment tab  
‚Ä¢ Insert into transaction sheet  
‚Ä¢ Status: `0-processing` ‚Üí `1-sending`  
‚Ä¢ Prevent duplicate sending ‚úÖ

#### Flow 2 ‚Äî Send Emails (Runs every 30 min)
‚Ä¢ Selects ‚Äúready‚Äù users (`1-sending`)  
‚Ä¢ Checks:
  - Missing email ‚Üí `3-no-email`
  - Disposable ‚Üí `4-disposal-email`
‚Ä¢ Sends via MailerSend template ID in sheet  
‚Ä¢ Updates status ‚Üí `2-sent` + message result

üéØ Your entire CRM sending logic runs automatically every day

---

### üß† Personalization Support
Available merge-fields:
‚Ä¢ `first_name`  
‚Ä¢ `discount_code`  
‚Ä¢ `gift_code`  
(Modify jsonBody to add more!)

---

### üîê MailerSend Setup Required
Inside MailerSend node:
- Replace ‚Äúinfo@example.com‚Äù with your verified sender email ‚úÖ

You must:
‚úî Verify domain  
‚úî Approve sender email  
‚úî Copy correct template ID ‚Üí Google Sheet  

---

### üí° Optional Enhancements
‚Ä¢ Slack alerts for failed sends  
‚Ä¢ Connect Looker Studio for dashboards  
‚Ä¢ Add SMS / WhatsApp parallel flows  
‚Ä¢ A/B test templates by duplicating rows  
‚Ä¢ Add AI for subject optimization or copy rewrite

---

### üì∫ Connect With Me
More workflows, CRM strategy & AI marketing automation üëá  
LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/nima-salimi-a655a6231  

Follow & ‚≠êÔ∏è this template if it helped you üöÄ

parameters.content:
# Description

## ‚úÖ Workflow Overview Summary (Based on Your Description)

### üîÅ **Flow 1: "Insert user_id"**

- Triggered manually or on schedule.
    
- You **choose a flow** via `Setup Flow` node by setting a `flow_id`.
    
- For each `user_id`, you **insert** a record into Google Sheet `transaction` table:
    
    - Fields: `user_id`, `phone_number`, `email`, `first_name`, `template_name`, etc.
        
    - Status: `0-processing`
        
- It checks for **duplicate `user_id`**.
    
    - If no duplicate ‚Üí **update status to `1-sending`**


### üì© **Flow 2: "Sending Email"**

- Triggered **every 30 minutes** via schedule.
    
- Selects records from Google Sheet where:
    
    - Table = `transaction`
        
    - `status = 1-sending`
        
- Checks:
    
    - ‚ùå If no email ‚Üí `status = 3-no-email`
        
    - üß™ If email is disposable ‚Üí `status = 4-disposal-email`
        
    - ‚úÖ If valid ‚Üí Send email via **Brevo**
        
        - Params: `email`, `first_name`, `template_name`, `discount_code`
            
        - Update:
            
            - `sent_result`
                
            - `status = 2-sent`


### ‚ûï **To Add Another Flow**

- Duplicate the **"insert"** flow.
    
- Change only the `Setup Flow` node to a new `template_id`.
    
- That `flow_id` corresponds to a record in `templates` (a table in Google Sheet) with all necessary metadata (e.g., template ID, discount code, etc.).

## template


| ---Id--- | ---template_name---                           | ---journey--- |---type---   | ---type_template_id---   | ---discount_code--- | ---gift_code--- |
|----|----------------------------------|------------------------------|--------|------------------|---------------|-----------|
| 1  | Churn-Pro-Plan                    | Pro-Retention                | email  | v28xxl2sq8dg785k              | dis111        | giftA     |
| 2  | Black-Friday-Deal                 | BF-Sales                     | email  | v28xxl2sq8dg785k              | bf50          | giftB     |
| 3  | Welcome-Flow                      | Onboarding                   | email  | v28xxl2sq8dg785k              |               |           |

# üìå Node-by-Node Description (MailerSend eCRM)

### üß± Setup Flow
‚Ä¢ Select campaign by setting `template_id`.

### üìÑ Get Templates (Google Sheets)
‚Ä¢ Load all rows from `template` sheet.

### üéØ Filter Template
‚Ä¢ Keep only the template matching `template_id`.

### üë• Get Users (CDP Sheet)
‚Ä¢ Read users from `segment` sheet (email + first name required).

### ‚ûï Add to Transaction (0-processing)
‚Ä¢ Create a record in `transaction` sheet for each user.

### üîç Fetch Processing Rows
‚Ä¢ Select rows where `status = 0-processing`.

### üö´ Remove Duplicates
‚Ä¢ Keep only 1 record per `user_id`.

### üîÅ Update Status (1-sending)
‚Ä¢ Mark users as ready to send: `status = 1-sending`.

### ‚è±Ô∏è Schedule Trigger
‚Ä¢ Runs every 30 min ‚Üí continues sending in background.

### üìå Fetch Sending Rows
‚Ä¢ Select rows where `status = 1-sending`.

### ‚úâÔ∏è Email Exists?
‚Ä¢ If empty ‚Üí `status = 3-no-email`.

### üõ°Ô∏è Disposable Check
‚Ä¢ If disposable ‚Üí `status = 4-disposal-email`.

### üì¨ MailerSend Send Email
‚Ä¢ Sends template email using:
  - `type_template_id` (MailerSend Template ID, text)
  - personalization: first_name, discount_code, gift_code

### ‚úÖ Update to 2-sent
‚Ä¢ Save:
  - status: `2-sent`
  - sent_at
  - sent_result (message ID)

nodes.name: Get all flow templates from Sheet

parameters.content:
# üìÑ Transaction Sheet (Copy This)

All example data for this workflow is already prepared ‚úÖ  
Open the Google Sheet below and copy the **Transaction** tab:

üîó Google Sheet:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17KqltP-NqchPhZV7gk6QToqCZX6IiA5EBkDCBNsIX_0/edit?usp=sharing

# ‚úâÔ∏è MailerSend Send Email

This node sends the campaign email to each valid subscriber.

‚úÖ Uses MailerSend Template ID from:
‚Ä¢ `type_template_id` field in template sheet (string)

‚úÖ Personalization fields:
‚Ä¢ first_name
‚Ä¢ discount_code
‚Ä¢ gift_code

‚ö†Ô∏è Required Setup:
üëâ Edit the "from" field inside the JSON:
"from": {
  "email": "YOUR_SENDER_EMAIL@here.com"
}

This email must be:
‚úÖ Verified inside MailerSend Dashboard
‚úÖ Approved by MailerSend to avoid blocked sends

üìå Output values saved:
‚Ä¢ sent_result ‚Üí MailerSend Message ID
‚Ä¢ sent_at ‚Üí Timestamp
‚Ä¢ status ‚Üí `2-sent`

Tip üß†: Test with your own email first before going live.

main.node: Get all flow templates from Sheet

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
